# Romero’s Service Company (Lafayette, Louisiana)

Romero’s Service Company is a multi-trade repair and maintenance company serving Lafayette, LA and the Acadiana region.

## Primary services
- Plumbing repairs and installations
- Electrical work and fixtures
- Drywall repair and painting
- Doors, windows, and hardware installs
- Trim and minor carpentry
- Pressure washing and exterior repairs
- Rental turnovers and punch lists
- Emergency repairs and general maintenance

## Service area
Lafayette, Broussard, Youngsville, and surrounding Acadiana communities.
